price: Kështu, kopshtin e goditi një fatkeqësi nga Zoti yt, ndërkohë që ata po flinin
arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: faṭāfa ʿalayhā ṭāifun min rabbika wahum nāimūna
